title: League Client not opening HELP

replies.body: Most of the time those bugsplats means that some critically failed between your pc and when it was trying to launch League. League doesn't know exactly what went wrong, so it throws this kind of generic error at you. Run through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and let me know if that gets League working correctly again.
